name: Botany Quest
description:
This prototype showcases what level in the game would look like and how it would play as well as what the Field Journal (inventory) will look like. I hit some complications with setting up the Journal and the plant images don’t show up in the slots for them within the journal. Future prototypes of this project would include other features listed in the design document: a light crafting system, reactions, non-player characters and a hub-world type space.

Controls:

A, S, W, D - movement

Q - View Journal (inventory)

E - Interact/Pick Up
